alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Oneida, western Madison, northeastern Cortland and Onondaga Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Otisco to Fabius. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Clay, Cicero, De Witt, Sullivan, Oneida, Lenox, Pompey and North Syracuse. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34 and 39. New York Interstate 81 between 15 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cortland; Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida
